articles.title: Congratulations to Chinese Vice-Chairman of CMC
articles.content:
Congratulations to Chinese Vice-Chairman of CMC
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Xi Jinping upon his election as vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the Communist Party of China at the 5th plenary meeting of the 17th Central Committee of the CPC.
					 The message said that Xi's assumption of the important post of the vice-chairman of the Central Military Commission of the CPC is an expression of the deep trust and expectation of the CPC and the army and people of China towards him.
					
					 Expressing the belief that the traditional DPRK-China friendship would steadily grow stronger and develop generation after generation thanks to the common efforts of the parties, armies and peoples of the two countries, the message sincerely wished him fresh success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Reception Given for Delegation of Veteran Fighters of CPV
articles.content:
Reception Given for Delegation of Veteran Fighters of CPV
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- A reception was given on Tuesday in honor of the delegation of veteran fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers on a visit to the DPRK on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the CPV into the Korean front.
					 Present there on invitation were the delegation of veteran fighters of the CPV led by Wang Hai, former commander of the Air Force of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, and staff members of the Chinese embassy here.
					
					 Present there were O Kuk Ryol, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, general officers and other officers of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.
					
					 The delegation of veteran fighters of the CPV arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Ju Sang Song Meets Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Ju Sang Song Meets Vietnamese Delegation
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Ju Sang Song, minister of People's Security, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Ministry of Public Security of Viet Nam led by Deputy Minister Bui Van Nam who paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Talks Held between DPRK and Vietnamese Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between DPRK and Vietnamese Delegations
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between the delegations of the Ministry of People's Security of the DPRK and the Ministry of Public Security of Viet Nam at the People's Palace of Culture on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the DPRK side were members of the delegation of the Ministry of People's Security headed by its Vice-minister Ho Yong Ho and from the Vietnamese side members of the delegation of the Ministry of Public Security led by its Deputy Minister Bui Van Nam and Charge d' Affaires ad Interim of Viet Nam here Nguyen Dinh Duong.
					
					 The two sides swapped views on the issue of boosting exchange and cooperation and other issues of common concern.

articles.title: Gift from Head of Vietnamese Delegation
articles.content:
Gift from Head of Vietnamese Delegation
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the head of the visiting delegation of the Ministry of Public Security of Viet Nam.
					 The gift was handed to Ju Sang Song, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and minister of People's Security, on Tuesday by Deputy Minister of Public Security of Viet Nam Bui Van Nam, who is heading the delegation.

articles.title: Talks between Delegations of WPK and Angolan Movement Held
articles.content:
Talks between Delegations of WPK and Angolan Movement Held
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Talks between the delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola took place in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the WPK side were Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the C.C., the WPK and from the Angolan side members of the delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola led by Jorge Inocencio Dombolo, member of the Political Bureau and coordinator of the Discipline and Audit Commission of the Central Committee of the movement.
					
					 At the talks, both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on the issue of developing the relations between the party and the movement and other issues of common concern.

articles.title: Reception Given for Angolan Delegation
articles.content:
Reception Given for Angolan Delegation 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception for the visiting delegation of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola on Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation led by Jorge Inocencio Dombolo, member of the Political Bureau and coordinator of the Discipline and Audit Commission of the Central Committee of the movement.
					
					 Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK and Ri Yong Chol, vice department director, and other officials of the C.C., the WPK were present there.
					
					 Kim Yong Il said in his speech at the reception that the movement under the correct leadership of President Jose Eduardo Dos Santos has gained great successes in its struggle to consolidate the stability and peace of the country and improve the standard of people's living by developing economy.
					
					 He expressed thanks to the movement for extending support and encouragement to the WPK and the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation and achieve the independent reunification of the country, setting store by the development of relations with the WPK.
					
					 He stressed that the WPK would make positive efforts to favorably develop the friendly relations with the movement in the future, too.
					
					 Jorge Inocencio Dombolo in his speech expressed belief that the visit of the delegation would make a contribution to the strengthening of the friendship and solidarity and the cooperative relations between the two countries.
					
					 He expressed warm thanks to the cooperation to Angola made by the WPK, the Korean government and people under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He pointed out the will to make efforts to continue consolidating and developing the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties and countries in the mutual interests.

articles.title: Gift from C.C., Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
articles.content:
Gift from C.C., Popular Liberation Movement of Angola
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by the Central Committee of the Popular Liberation Movement of Angola.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Tuesday by Jorge Inocencio Dombolo, member of the Political Bureau and coordinator of the Discipline and Audit Commission of the Central Committee of the movement, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Hungarian Communist Workers' Party Delegation Goes Back
articles.content:
Hungarian Communist Workers' Party Delegation Goes Back 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party headed by its Chairman Gyula Thurmer Tuesday flew back after wrapping up its visit to the DPRK.
					 During the stay in Pyongyang the delegation visited the Kumsusan Memorial Palace to pay tribute to President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The delegation also visited Mangyongdae, the E-Library and Indoor Swimming Pool of Kim Il Sung University, the Party Founding Museum, the Taedonggang Combined Fruit Farm, the Ostrich Farm on the outskirts of Pyongyang and others.
					
					 It also appreciated the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".

articles.title: Folk Games, Amusements Increasingly Popular
articles.content:
Folk Games, Amusements Increasingly Popular
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The 8th National Ssirum (Korean wrestling) Tournament for Grand Bull Prize was held in the Ssirum Ground on Rungna Islet in September.
					 Ri Jo Won from North Phyongan Province won the tournament to take a grand bull weighing nearly one ton, gold cowbell and diploma.
					
					 Folk games and amusements created through many years of labor have ever developed in the country under the state care and public interest.
					
					 In this autumn season a lot of people, including youth and schoolchildren, enjoy folk games and amusements at parks, pleasure grounds and other places in red-letter days and leisure time.
					
					Popular among them are ssirum, arm wrestling, swinging, seesaw, rope-skipping, Korean chess, koni game, cat's cradle and other contest of wits.
					
					 Arm wrestling is played by old and young people and children everywhere -- on lawn, in house and at working sit.
					
					 Little girls and boys favor rope-skipping and hide-and-seek.
					
					 The banks of the Pothong and Taedong Rivers are crowded with people and children enjoying yut and koni games and Korean chess.

articles.title: Up-And-Coming Paddler
articles.content:
Up-And-Coming Paddler 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Yu Myong Rim, a pupil of Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School, is gaining popularity in his teens as a young table tennis star in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 He greatly contributed to his team winning the table tennis tournament of the 36th National Schoolchildren's Sports Contest for Jongilbong Prize held some time ago. He bagged two gold medals at the tournament. 
					
					 Last year, he won the singles of the juvenile table tennis tournament of the 46th National Games of Juvenile Sports Schools.
					
					 His forte is backhand drive and strong shot and cutting. 
					
					 He began playing table tennis in the first year of primary school. He is gifted with wrist snap.
					
					 Choe Chun Ae, a 38-year-old physical education teacher of Pyongyang June 9 Ryongbuk Secondary School, told KCNA that Yu Myong Rim would surely distinguish himself in both local and  international tournaments in the future.

articles.title: Implementation of WPK's Revolutionary Mass Line Called for
articles.content:
Implementation of WPK's Revolutionary Mass Line Called for 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The mass line of the Workers' Party of Korea is the most revolutionary line whose validity was fully proved in the revolution and construction and a weapon for single-minded unity which should be held fast to in the on-going general offensive for building a thriving nation.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says this in a signed article. 
					
					 It goes on: 
					
					 The revolutionary mass line serves as a supreme principle for the activities of the WPK and the state based on the viewpoint that the popular masses are the driving force of the revolution and construction.
					
					 Ever since the very day of its founding the WPK has regarded it as one of the fundamental issues for strengthening the party and the revolutionary ranks and victoriously advancing the cause of socialism to thoroughly implement the revolutionary mass line and always channeled great efforts into the work with the masses. 
					
					 All the servicepersons and people, united close around the great WPK, are now waging a general offensive for opening the gate to a thriving nation, strikingly demonstrating the dignity and stamina of Songun Korea. This reality today clearly testifies to the validity and vitality of the WPK's mass line.
					
					 The validity and vitality of the WPK's mass line find a vivid manifestation in that all the people single-mindedly remain true to the party's leadership, reposing undisputed trust in it, boundlessly love and resolutely safeguard the socialist system in the country and devote all their wisdom and enthusiasm to achieving its prosperity.
					
					 The revolutionary mass line serves as a powerful treasured sword for strengthening the driving force of the Korean revolution in every way and bringing about epoch-making creations and changes in building a rich and powerful country.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers' Moves for War against DPRK Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers' Moves for War against DPRK Slammed 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean bellicose forces staged PSI exercises with outside forces in waters off Pusan on Oct. 13 and 14 despite the unanimous protest and denunciation at home and abroad.
					 These exercises were participated in by warships and sea-patrol planes of the puppet navy, commandos of the puppet maritime police to inspect ships and troops of the U.S. forces and their allies.   
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 These large-scale exercises were a deliberate armed provocation intended to push the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war quite contrary to the desire of the nation and treacherous moves to ignite a war in a bid to vitiate the hard-won atmosphere of dialogue and aggravate the situation.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that the south Korean authorities spearheaded the exercises in waters off Pusan for the first time in history. 
					
					 Pusan hosts aircraft carriers, strategic nuclear submarines and warships of the U.S. which frequent south Korea and serves as a base for supplying war materiel. 
					
					  South Korea-U.S. joint military exercises targeted against the DPRK, annual events, were kicked off in Pusan and waters off it.
					
					 It is needless to say that PSI exercises staged in waters off Pusan recently were part of the exercises for a war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the south Korean bellicose forces let even the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" participate in them.
					
					The above-said saber-rattling staged by the south Korean warmongers in collusion with Japan, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, goes to prove that they leave no means untried to do harm to compatriots. 
					
					 As the reality shows, the inter-Korean relations are not improved despite the positive measures and sincere efforts on the part of the DPRK side entirely because of the south Korean authorities' wrong stand and attitude. They are only seeking to do harm to compatriots, regarding them as their "principal enemy".
					
					 However, the warmongers' moves to escalate the confrontation with compatriots would only touch off the nation's curse and denunciation of them and precipitate their doom.

articles.title: US and S. Korean Warmongers' Joint Air Battle Exercises Flayed
articles.content:
US and S. Korean Warmongers' Joint Air Battle Exercises Flayed
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military has been busy with madcap large-scale air battle exercises with U.S. forces in the air over the western part of the Korean Peninsula since October 15.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The south Korean military warmongers kicked off the above-said air battle exercises with the U.S. imperialists right after their provocative PSI exercises came to a close. This is an intolerable provocation to the DPRK and a blatant challenge to the desire of the Koreans to see the inter-Korean relations improved and the need of the times. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities claim that the said exercises are aimed at countering "provocations" from someone, but they are, needless to say, designed to mount a preemptive attack on the DPRK in the light of their scale and programs. 
					
					 The puppet military is spearheading the exercises now under way in the air over the western part of the Korean Peninsula with combined air forces of south Korea and the U.S. involved. Herein lies a dangerous military purpose. 
					
					 The provocations now being perpetrated by the south Korean military warmongers under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case have reached an extremely reckless phase.
					
					 This once again brings to light the conservative group's intention to realize its ambition for invading the DPRK at any cost, backed by outside forces.
					
					 The reality goes to prove that the south Korean authorities are not interested in improving the inter-Korean relations and reunifying the country at all but are keen only on escalating the confrontation with compatriots.
					
					The south Korean authorities would be well advised to face up to the trend of the times and halt at once the dangerous saber-rattling pushing the inter-Korean relations into extremes.

articles.title: Birthday of WPK Celebrated
articles.content:
Birthday of WPK Celebrated
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Lectures, meetings, art performances and film shows were held by the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, the Communist Party of Tajikistan, the Workers' Party of Bangladesh and the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party on Oct. 6 and 8 to celebrate the reelection of General Secretary Kim Jong Il as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 65th birthday of the WPK.
					 Present there were political and social personages of relevant countries and masses.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Propaganda and Education Ideological Commission of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party at a lecture spoke highly of the WPK that developed into a powerful one and gained great successes in all fields under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The organizational department director of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan at a lecture said that Kim Jong Il weathered the difficulties and firmly defended socialism with his original Songun politics at the end of the last century.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers’ Party of Bangladesh and other speakers at the meetings noted with appreciation that the Korean people set a global example in defending the country's sovereignty and building a great prosperous and powerful nation and that the DPRK turned into a politico-ideological and military power that no one dares provoke.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party at the art performance and film show lauded the leadership exploits the President and Kim Jong Il performed in party building, assuring that the Hungarian Communist Workers' Party will extend support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK and make positive efforts for the development of the relations between the two parties in the future, too.
					
					 Photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Finland, India, Mongolia, Russia and Malaysia from Oct. 1 to 10 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in Hungary and Finland.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Moves Denounced by American Organizations
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Moves  Denounced by American Organizations
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The U.S. Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the U.S. Solidarity Committee to Support the AINDF and the South Korean People's Struggle made public a joint statement on Oct. 6 in denunciation of the anti-DPRK war moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces.
					 The statement noted:
					
					 We vehemently denounce the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for staging the joint anti-submarine exercise recently. 
					
					 This is part of the ceaseless war exercises being staged in south Korea for a war of aggression against the DPRK. 
					
					 The war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces are aimed at browbeating the Korean people and reducing them to slaves of the imperialists.
					
					 There is no reason whatsoever for them to stage such war maneuvers against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are waiting for a chance to invade and conquer the DPRK, threatening the world in violation of international law on sovereignty. 
					
					 We vehemently lash out at the war exercises of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces and demand them cancel all the projected war exercises for invading the DPRK.
					
					 We are confident that the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces' moves for aggression are bound to be frustrated by the Korean people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported 
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- Milton Burbano, chairman of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, made public a statement on Oct. 9 on the occasions of the 65th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo. 
					 He, in the statement, recalled that Kim Il Sung founded the WPK on Oct. 10, 1945 and set forth a proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo on October 10, 1980.
					
					 He warmly congratulated Gneral Secretary Kim Jong Il upon his reelection as general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 He called upon the friendship and solidarity organizations in Latin America to intensify the activities supporting the just cause of the Korean people for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieving national reunification.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported by Brazilian Party
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported by Brazilian Party
 Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea is the great party which President Kim Il Sung founded and led to victory. 
					 Nelson Chaves dos Santos, international secretary of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said this when interviewed by KCNA. 
					
					 He continued:
					
					The President led the revolution and construction guided by the Juche idea, building a socialist power in Korea.
					
					 The life of the President serves as an example for the world revolutionaries.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of the President has been successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Korean people under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il have brought about a great leap forward in production and construction with the faith in the victory of socialism. 
					
					 I am convinced that the Korean people will surely build a great prosperous and powerful nation. 
					
					 Thanks to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has turned into a powerful country which no one dares provoke.
					
					 I wish the Korean people remaining true to the leadership of Kim Jong Il greater progress and prosperity. 
					
					 The Party for Free Motherland of Brazil will extend full support to the Korean people in their struggle to achieve prosperity and reunification of the country and make positive efforts to develop the friendly relations with the Workers' Party of Korea in the future, too.

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, October 19 (KCNA) -- One March day in Juche 67 (1978), an official of the mission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in a European country was seriously wounded to be at the point of death.
					 Upon receiving the news, General Secretary Kim Jong Il told officials concerned that there would be no mother doing nothing with her son placed in a critical condition in an alien land. He also said a plane should be sent to the country with doctors and medicines to save him at any cost.
					
					 Emergency measures had been instantly taken for the patient. He was carried to a modern hospital to undergo the second operation, but his condition failed to take a favorable turn.
					
					 The leader had an urgent telegram sent to the DPRK mission again for the third operation under the direction of able doctors in the homeland.
					
					 After the third operation the patient came to his senses and after a month he was able to go on foot.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "Liang Shanbo y Zhu Yingtai"
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la opera "Liang Shanbo y Zhu Yingtai"
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la opera "Liang Shanbo y Zhu Yingtai" creada por el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre de Corea adaptando la famosa leyenda popular de China de igual nombre.
					Este cuento, que se transmite de boca en boca por mas de mil 600 anos desde el siglo 4 de nuestra era, se trata del tragico amor entre Zhu Yingtai, hija de una familia aristocratica, y Liang Shanbo, hijo de la familia de un erudito humilde.
					
					  Esta leyenda revela y critica mordazmente el caracter criminal del sistema de jerarquia y matrimonio en el feudalismo a traves de la historia romantica de esos enamorados que no logran casarse en vida debido a las duras trabas y opresion del feudalismo, pero renacen desde sus tumbas como una pareja de mariposas.
					
					  La peculiar funcion de la opera arranco efusiva ovacion de los espectadores porque ha descrito con verosimilitud la version original asegurando el alto nivel artistico.
					
					  Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente felicito los exitos logrados en la ocasion por los ejecutantes respondiendo cordialmente con su mano alzada a las aclamaciones hospitalarias de ellos y espectadores.
					
					  Volvio a evaluar altamente los exitos de los creadores y artistas mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan creado otra opera magnifica en menos de un ano dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion, y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					  Esta opera es una magnifica obra maestra en que todos sus componentes como la cancion, escenografia y vestidos alcanzaron el alto nivel artistico, senalo y subrayo que este exito orgulloso logrado por el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre es el fruto brillante de las extraordinarias fuerzas espirituales de nuestros artistas revolucionarios y del autoctono metodo de creacion al estilo coreano.
					
					  Los artistas noveles y los estudiantes del conservatorio cumplieron satisfactoriamente en la opera sus papeles con sus grandes habilidades artisticas, apunto y destaco que gracias al gran numero de los fidedignos artistas de reserva como ellos, es muy prometedor el futuro del arte del Juche.
					
					  Es muy loable que el Conjunto Operistico Mar de Sangre haya acabado otra opera con la sincera cooperacion de los companeros chinos en visperas del 60o aniversario de la participacion del Cuerpo de Voluntarios del Pueblo Chino en el frente coreano, dijo y afirmo que consolidar y desarrollar mas la amistad Corea-China es la invariable voluntad del partido y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					  Senalando que el intercambio cultural juega el papel importante en fomentar el entendimiento mutuo y las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los paises, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que las entidades artisticas, incluyendo dicho conjunto, crearan e interpretaran muchas obras mas que contribuyan a la defensa de la paz y la seguridad del mundo y al cumplimiento de la causa de independencia de la humanidad.
					
					  En esta ocasion el Dirigente fue acompanado por Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok y Hong Sok Hyong, miembros del Buro Politico (BP) y secretarios del CC del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui, miembro del BP y jefa de departamento del CC del PTC, Kang Sok Ju, miembro del BP del CC del PTC y viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del BP del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su y Kim Phyong Hae, miembros suplentes del BP y secretarios del CC del PTC, y los funcionarios de los sectores de literatura y arte, prensa e informacion.

articles.title: Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y Vietnam
articles.content:
Conversaciones entre delegaciones de Corea y Vietnam
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 19 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Ministerio de Seguridad del Pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la del Ministerio de Seguridad Publica de Vietnam.
					  En la ocasion participaron por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion del MINSEP presidida por el viceministro Ho Yong Ho, y por la vietnamita, los miembros de la delegacion del Ministerio de Seguridad Publica de Vietnam encabezada por el viceministro Bui Van Nam y el encargado vietnamita de negocios a.i. en Corea, Nguyen Dinh Duong.
					
					  En la ocasion ambas partes intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el fortalecimiento de intercambio y cooperacion y otros problemas de interes mutuo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente del jefe de delegacion vietnamita
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente del jefe de delegacion vietnamita
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera el jefe de la delegacion del Ministerio de Seguridad Publica de Vietnam, de visita en Corea.
					El viceministro Bui Van Nam, quien preside la delegacion, lo entrego el dia 19 al miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y ministro de Seguridad del Pueblo, Ju Sang Song.

articles.title: Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y MPLA
articles.content:
Conversan en Pyongyang las delegaciones del PTC y MPLA
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 19 en esta capital las conversaciones entre la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea (PTC) y la del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola (MPLA).
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Ri Yong Chol, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, y otros funcionarios del CC del PTC por la parte coreana y por la angolena, los miembros de la delegacion del MPLA encabezada por Jorge Inocencio Dombolo, miembro del Buro Politico y coordinador de la Comision de Disciplina y Auditoria del CC del MPLA.
					
					Ambas partes informaron mutuamente de las actividades de los respectivos partidos e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre el mayor desarrollo de las relaciones entre ambos partidos y otros temas de interes comun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe presente de MPLA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe presente de MPLA
Pyongyang, 19 de octubre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio regalo que le dirigiera el Comite Central del Movimiento Popular de Liberacion de Angola (MPLA).
					Jorge Inocencio Dombolo, miembro del Buro Politico y coordinador de la Comision de Disciplina y Auditoria del CC del MPLA, de visita en Corea, lo entrego este martes a Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
